name: Art
description: A diverse range of human activities involving creative expression.

name: Video Games
description: An electronic game that involves interaction with a user interface to generate visual feedback.

name: Photos
description: An image created by light falling on a photosensitive surface.

name: Videos
description: A collection of various videos, including educational content, entertainment, tutorials, and more.

name: Music
description: An art form consisting of sound and silence.

name: Movies
description: A form of visual communication used to convey experiences, stories, and ideas.

name: Books
description: A set of written, printed, or blank sheets bound together.
